kannada_original: ಮೊದಲು ಅತಿ ಉತ್ಸಾಹ ತೋರದಿರು ನೀ ಸುಮ್ಮ
english_transliteration: modalu ati utsāha tōradiru nī sum’ma
english_translation: Do not show excessive enthusiasm merely at first,
Like a washerman beating clothes when they are new.
Initial bravado is not beneficial for progress!

kannada_original: ದುಡಿ ಮೊದಲು, ನುಡಿ ಬಳಿಕ ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ. 520
english_transliteration: duḍi modalu, nuḍi baḷika Muddu Rāma. 520
english_translation: Work first, speak afterwards, Muddu Rāma. 520
